Juicy Fest: Rival bites gang member’s ear in scuffle at North Harbour Stadium hip-hop festival https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/juicy-fest-rival-bites-gang-members-ear-in-scuffle-at-north-harbour-stadium-hip-hop-festival/46YEWOMMMNEQZLUBH3FKXHFPGI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/juicy-fest-rival-bites-gang-members-ear-in-scuffle-at-north-harbour-stadium-hip-hop-festival/46YEWOMMMNEQZLUBH3FKXHFPGI/Police confirm man received medical treatment for 'injuries to ear'. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 02:14:36 +0000 A police officer was hit with a bottle and there were scenes of intoxication, disorder and assault involving people - including suspected gang members - outside the Juicy Fest music festival in Wellington.
El Nino: Why ocean heatwaves and the Tasman Sea blob are making for a messy summer https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/el-nino-why-ocean-heatwaves-and-the-tasman-sea-blob-are-making-for-a-messy-summer/4QNUIPWHNFGBZABZAFL6PUIY2A/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/el-nino-why-ocean-heatwaves-and-the-tasman-sea-blob-are-making-for-a-messy-summer/4QNUIPWHNFGBZABZAFL6PUIY2A/ Jamie MortonA blob of warm ocean water is adding a decidedly different flavour to our El Nino summer. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 03:02:07 +0000 A vast swathe of warm ocean water to the north of New Zealand is adding more variability to our El Nino summer. Image / Niwa

ELE group collapse: Workers forced to sleep in cars, owner pleads for payment https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/ele-group-collapse-workers-forced-to-sleep-in-cars-owner-pleads-for- payment/YUCB2UKAUFGPZIJEAZKBSX2W6A/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/ele-group-collapse-workers-forced-to-sleep-in-cars-owner-pleads-for- payment/YUCB2UKAUFGPZIJEAZKBSX2W6A/ Anne Gibson'I urge you to consider the consequences of withholding payment': ELE owner to clients Sun, 07 Jan 2024 21:48:20 +0000 Up to 24 ex-ELE Group workers have been forced to sleep in their cars, unable to afford rent or power and struggling to survive here.
